quote: I used to have an open mind, but my brains kept falling out.
source: Bumper Sticker from [*Uncle John's Triumphant 20th Anniversary Bathroom Reader*](https://www.amazon.com/Uncle-Triumphant-Anniversary-Bathroom-Reader/dp/1592230938)

quote: I feel like I'm diagonally parked in a parallel universe.
source: Bumper Sticker from [*Uncle John's Triumphant 20th Anniversary Bathroom Reader*](https://www.amazon.com/Uncle-Triumphant-Anniversary-Bathroom-Reader/dp/1592230938)

quote: The early bird may get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
source: Bumper Sticker from [*Uncle John's Triumphant 20th Anniversary Bathroom Reader*](https://www.amazon.com/Uncle-Triumphant-Anniversary-Bathroom-Reader/dp/1592230938)

quote: If we quit voting, will they all go away?

quote: When everything is coming your way, you're in the wrong lane.

quote: My dog can lick anyone.

quote: I need somebody bad. Are you bad?
source: Bumper Sticker from [*Uncle John's Triumphant 20th Anniversary Bathroom Reader*](https://www.amazon.com/Uncle-Triumphant-Anniversary-Bathroom-Reader/dp/1592230938)

quote: If you have a difficult task, give it to a lazy person; they will find an easier way to do it.
source: Hlade's Law, sometimes misattributed to Bill Gates

quote: Anything that can go wrong, will—at the worst possible moment.
Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
No.
The more you weigh, the harder you are to kidnap. Stay safe. Eat cake.
source: Billboards at assorted eateries in NYC

quote: Wake, girl. Your head is becoming the pillow.
You're too late too early.
Age is a very high price to pay for maturity.
Do what you think is right in your heart. You’ll be criticized anyway.
Eat well, stay fit, die anyway
Experience is a wonderful thing. It enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
Bowling is a sport for those who have talent to spare.
It is better to be thought a fool than to open your mouth and remove all doubt.
It is better to swallow words than to have to eat them later.
I’ve had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn’t it.
I’ve suffered a great many catastrophies in my life. Most of them never happened.
Mistakes will happen; others will be blamed.
Never criticize a man till you have walked a mile in his shoes. That way when you do criticize him, you are a mile ahead and you have his shoes.
Never try to teach a pig to sing. It only frustrates you and really annoys the pig.
Poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese.
Speak the truth but leave immediately after.
There’s nothing wrong with you that reincarnation won’t cure.
When you get at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
Who was the one who put the needle in the haystack anyway?
Sudo make me a sandwich
Is the house made of flesh? Or is he made of house?
If you fall, I'll be there.
You know it's cold outside when you go outside and it's cold
The difference between genius and stupidity is that genius has its limits
If you can't convince them, confuse them.
Me? I should get down off this unicorn and slap you.
Life is not a fairy tale. If you lose your shoe at midnight, you're drink.
The more I learn about other people, the more I like my dog.
When life shuts a door on you, open it again. That's how they work.
Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
One bad programmer can easily create two new jobs a year.
Computers are good at following instructions, but not at reading your mind.
Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining or testing your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
When debugging, novices  insert corrective code; experts remove defective code.

And then it occurred to me that a computer is a stupid machine with the ability to do incredibly smart things, while computer programmers are smart people with the ability to do incredibly stupid things. They are, in short, a perfect match.
